# The course at the SOLARIS UJ Centre - for PhD students.-- AGH University Doctoral School 

URL: https://www.sd.agh.edu.pl/en/events/detail?tx_sfeventmgt_pieventdetail%5Baction%5D=detail&tx_sfeventmgt_pieventdetail%5Bcontroller%5D=Event&tx_sfeventmgt_pieventdetail%5Bevent%5D=557&cHash=8c0e31a248405781c4740591e4990c0a
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:58

Skip to content

Skip to footer

Events

The course at the SOLARIS UJ Centre - for PhD students.

 03.03.2025 

 03.06.2025 

 Download iCal file 

Add to Google Calendar

Add to Outlook Calendar

Add to Office 365 Calendar

Add to Yahoo Calendar

 Description 

Dear Sir/Madam,

On behalf of the Director of the National Synchrotron Radiation Centre SOLARIS UJ, Dr. Hab. Jakub Szlachetko, I would like to invite PhD students to participate in the course titled 
"National Centre SOLARIS - Synchrotron Radiation for Science."

The course will be held remotely via the MS Teams platform.

Lecture sessions will take place from 
March 3rd to June 9th, every Monday from 16:00 to 17:30.

Project sessions are scheduled for 
April 8th, April 15th, May 20th, May 27th, and June 3rd (Tuesdays) from 11:00 to 13:30.

Number of ECTS points: 3

EVENT DETAILS

Stopka
